about_the_game:
Stealth is a stealth game featuring a style of near-future science fiction,where you strengthen yourself with various equipment and sneak in diversified scenes by stealth as a chivalrous bandit. Different equipment brings you different skills, which could help you deal with various tricks and enemies in different scenes. You not only can choose a Story mode to experience the full storyline, but also can choose a Challenge mode to try levels randomly generated. In brief, hiding and stealth, instead of killing or battling, are the main objectives of all your actions.

Key features:

  • Challenging Stealth
    This game rewards players for not killing or fighting anyone. A variety ofenemy and trick settings of each level adds challenges to every stealth.
  • Multiple Ending Storyline
    Player’s different actions lead to different branching storylines, which directs characters to different endings.
  • Challenges Never Be the Same
    Under a Challenge mode, maps and settings are generated randomly, meaning that players will never encounter the same challenges while playing.
  • Stunning Visual Effect
    A unique sense of science and technology highlightsa style of near-future science fiction.
  • Various Characters and Skills
    Characters with different equipment can unlock a diversity of skills. Players are empowered by mastering various skills.
